column5: River, lakes and lovers...visiting the hill country for a quick get a way or staying for a vacation, my property puts you right in the middle of all the fun attractions, yet it's quiet. Check it out, you will be glad you did!  Casa Blanca is fully furnished, full size kitchen, towels, coffee maker, pots and pans, mixer, etc. Dogs are allowed upon approval, if they are house trained, crated when you leave and there is a $125 non-refundable fee.
